review.description:
The Good.

-Solid selection of salsa, beer, and other bodega staples.
-Boar's head sandwiches.
-The guy at the counter is nice.

The Bad.

-I have no idea how to pronounce the name.
-Not open late (Jessie's on Atlantic is 24 hours, FYI).
-Those sandwiches are about as average as it gets.

The Ugly.

-Ever since that record-breaking Mega Millions jackpot, I can't stop buying lotto tickets. Addiction is an ugly thing.
review.author: Peter D.

review.description: Convenient location (for me), good deli meats and prices, but the groceries are pricey. I wish they carried the usual mix of fresh pasteries that the other places do, and closing at 9pm limits my evening impulse ice cream buying ;)
review.author: Adam W.
